SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT a.app_id ,b.equipment_id ,a.device_software_type , d.access_status ,e.device_so_run_status, e.cpu_rate ,e.storage_rate , e.error_rate , MAX(e.create_time) time , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mon_device_abn f WHERE f.equipment_id = b.equipment_id) as device_warning FROM eqi_device a RIGHT JOIN eqi_equipment b on a.equipment_int = b.equipment_int LEFT JOIN mon_soft_status e ON e.equipment_id = b.equipment_id LEFT JOIN mon_equipment_status d ON d.equipment_id = b.equipment_id LEFT JOIN mon_device_abn c ON c.equipment_id = b.equipment_id GROUP BY b.equipment_id ) total
and equipment_id like '%${equipmentId}%'
and app_id like '%${APPId}%'
and device_software_type like '%${deviceSoftwareType}%'
and device_so_run_status like '%${deviceSoRunStatus}%'

SELECT a.app_id ,b.equipment_id ,a.device_software_type , d.access_status ,e.device_so_run_status, e.cpu_rate ,e.storage_rate , e.error_rate , MAX(e.create_time) time , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mon_device_abn f WHERE f.equipment_id = b.equipment_id) as device_warning FROM eqi_device a RIGHT JOIN eqi_equipment b on a.equipment_int = b.equipment_int LEFT JOIN mon_soft_status e ON e.equipment_id = b.equipment_id LEFT JOIN mon_equipment_status d ON d.equipment_id = b.equipment_id LEFT JOIN mon_device_abn c ON c.equipment_id = b.equipment_id GROUP BY b.equipment_id
equipment_id = #{equipmentId} and
app_id = #{APPId} and
device_software_type = #{deviceSoftwareType} and
device_so_run_status = #{deviceSoRunStatus} and
order by ${field} ${order}
limit ${begin},${limit}
